name: Astocreep Invasion 3D
description:
Invade Earth as the parasites return to wear the corpses of the local inhabitants! Guide the alien from being a simple defenseless worm through several evolutions, each more grotesque and terrifying than the last! Assimilate your way up the food chain to create a nest and invade the town!



- Reverse-horror adventure , you are the monster!
- Solve puzzles to evolve; get deadlier with each evolution!
- A remake of the original, now in 3D!
- Available in windowed or fullscreen!
